title: APT ORB / wearing fancy loafers
description: Putting the shoes on gives a one time +1 to Indirect Modes of Taxation, you capitalist swine.

dialogueTree.title: Savoir Faire: "Mm, the luxury of fine things. Just..."
dialogueTree.text: Mm, the luxury of fine things. Just look at those black monk straps! After spending an entire day hustling, who's to say that you *didn't* deserve a pair of ridiculously expensive shoes on your tired feet?

links.title: You: "You're right, beautiful things do m..."
links.text: You're right, beautiful things do make people happy...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Beautiful things give you a *rush*...."
links.text: Beautiful things give you a *rush*. It's power -- crafting your style, draping your flesh in silk and leather, deciding how to present yourself to the world.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Remember, when they come to take it..."
links.text: Remember, when they come to take it *away* from you -- you *worked* for those shoes. Whether you like it or not, wearing these shoes has made you more liberal -- *ultra*liberal.

links.title: Rhetoric: "They're either a gateway drug -- or..."
links.text: They're either a gateway drug -- or a booster pack -- to get you *deeper* into free market ideology.

links.title: You: "Oops, it's a fashion faux pas! [Dis..."
links.text: Oops, it's a fashion faux pas! [Discard the thought -- and the shoes!]

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Let's hope no one saw you wearing t..."
links.text: Let's hope no one saw you wearing these outrageously expensive -- and ultraliberal! -- shoes.
